Instructions: Cook shredded chicken in ají sauce with bread and milk.

Instructions: Cook spaghetti with cilantro and spices.

Instructions: Stir fry rice with chicken/vegetables and soy sauce.

Instructions: Bake almond cake and dust with powdered sugar.

Instructions: Boil octopus, serve with potatoes and paprika.

Instructions: Cook meatballs in tomato sauce.

Instructions: Cook rice in milk with sugar and cinnamon.

Instructions: Cook rice with saffron and meats.

Quantity: 4 potatoes, 4 eggs, 1 onion
Instructions: Cook potatoes and onion, mix with eggs and fry.

Quantity: 200g flour, 100ml milk, 100g ham/vegetables, 50g breadcrumbs
Instructions: Make croquettes with filling and breadcrumbs.

Quantity: 200g flour, 100g sugar, 1 tsp cinnamon, 100g chocolate
Instructions: Fry dough and serve with chocolate sauce.

Quantity: 500ml milk, 100g sugar, 4 eggs, 1 tsp vanilla
Instructions: Bake custard and caramelize top.

Quantity: 200g rice, 150g chicken, 150g rabbit, 100g vegetables, 1 tsp saffron
Instructions: Cook rice with saffron and meats.

Quantity: 4 potatoes, 4 eggs, 1 onion
Instructions: Cook potatoes and onion, mix with eggs and fry.

Quantity: 200g vegetables, 2 tomatoes, 2 tbsp olive oil
Instructions: Cook vegetables in olive oil and serve.

Ingredients: maida, potato, tomato, ginger, garam masala, salt, oil
Quantity: 2 cups maida, 3 medium potatoes, 1 tomato, 1 tsp grated ginger, 1/2 tsp garam masala, salt to taste, oil for frying
Instructions: Knead maida with water and a pinch of salt into soft dough. Rest 20 mins. Roll into small discs and deep fry into puffed luchis. For alur dom, boil potatoes and cut into cubes. Sauté tomatoes and ginger in oil, add potatoes, garam masala, and cook covered for 10 minutes.

Quantity: 1 large eggplant, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Slice eggplant into 1/2 inch rounds. Rub with turmeric and salt. Let rest 10 minutes. Heat mustard oil in a pan and shallow fry slices until golden on both sides. Serve hot.

Ingredients: rohu fish, potato, tomato, turmeric, mustard oil, salt
Quantity: 4 pieces rohu fish, 2 potatoes, 1 tomato, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Marinate fish with salt and turmeric. Fry lightly and set aside. In mustard oil, fry sliced potatoes and tomato. Add turmeric and water to make gravy. Add fish and simmer covered for 10 minutes until cooked.

Ingredients: chana dal, coconut, ginger, bay leaf, ghee, salt
Quantity: 1 cup chana dal, 2 tbsp grated coconut, 1 tsp grated ginger, 1 bay leaf, 1 tbsp ghee, salt to taste
Instructions: Boil chana dal until soft. In ghee, sauté bay leaf and ginger. Add coconut and stir. Pour in cooked dal, season with salt, and simmer for 5–7 minutes. Serve warm.

Quantity: 1 liter full-fat milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 tbsp plain yogurt
Instructions: Boil milk and reduce to 3/4th. Add caramelized sugar and cool until lukewarm. Stir in yogurt and pour into clay pots. Cover and let set in a warm place for 6–8 hours or overnight.

Ingredients: flour, rice flour, coconut, jaggery, milk, cardamom
Quantity: 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup rice flour, 1 cup grated coconut, 1/2 cup jaggery, 1 cup milk, 1/2 tsp cardamom powder
Instructions: Make batter with flour, rice flour, and milk. For filling, cook coconut, jaggery, and cardamom powder in a pan until mixed. Make thin crepes on a non-stick pan, fill with coconut mix, roll and serve warm or chilled.

Ingredients: dry fish, onion, garlic, chili, mustard oil, turmeric, salt
Quantity: 200g dry fish, 2 onions, 4 garlic cloves, 2 green chilies, 2 tbsp mustard oil, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste
Instructions: Wash and soak dry fish briefly. Fry dry fish in mustard oil until crisp and set aside. In same pan, sauté chopped onion, garlic, and chilies. Add turmeric, salt, and fried fish. Cook for 10 minutes until well combined and aromatic.

Ingredients: chana dal, ginger, asafoetida, tomato, garam masala, oil, salt
Quantity: 1 cup chana dal, 1 tsp grated ginger, pinch of asafoetida, 1 tomato, 1/2 tsp garam masala, 2 tbsp oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Soak chana dal and grind to a paste. Cook with ginger, asafoetida, and salt. Spread and cool on a greased plate, then cut into squares. Fry until golden. For gravy, sauté tomato in oil, add garam masala, and water. Add fried lentil cakes and simmer for 10 minutes.

Ingredients: bitter gourd, raw banana, potato, drumstick, mustard paste, milk, mustard oil
Quantity: 1 bitter gourd, 1 raw banana, 1 potato, 1 drumstick, 1 tbsp mustard paste, 1/4 cup milk, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Cut vegetables into sticks. Fry bitter gourd separately. In mustard oil, cook other vegetables. Add mustard paste, water, and simmer. Add milk at the end and stir gently. Cook until all veggies are soft but not mushy.

Ingredients: banana blossom, potato, coconut, mustard oil, spices, ginger, salt
Quantity: 1 banana blossom, 1 potato, 2 tbsp grated coconut, 2 tbsp mustard oil, 1/2 tsp panch phoron, 1 tsp grated ginger, salt to taste
Instructions: Clean and boil chopped banana blossom. In mustard oil, fry potato cubes. Add panch phoron, ginger, and boiled mocha. Add salt and grated coconut. Cook covered for 10–12 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Ingredients: bhetki fish, mustard paste, banana leaf, mustard oil, salt, green chili
Quantity: 4 pieces bhetki fish, 2 tbsp mustard paste, 2 banana leaves, 2 tbsp mustard oil, salt to taste, 2 green chilies
Instructions: Marinate fish with mustard paste, salt, and green chili. Place each piece on a banana leaf brushed with oil, fold tightly. Steam or cook in covered pan for 15–20 minutes until fish is tender and infused with flavor.

Ingredients: leftover rice, onion, chili, salt, mustard oil, water
Quantity: 1 cup cooked rice, 1/2 onion (sliced), 1 green chili, salt to taste, 1 tsp mustard oil, water as needed
Instructions: Soak leftover rice in water overnight. Drain slightly before serving. Top with sliced onion, chili, salt, and drizzle mustard oil. Traditionally served with fried fish or mashed veggies.

Ingredients: egg, onion, tomato, garlic, turmeric, chili powder, salt, oil
Quantity: 4 boiled eggs, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 garlic cloves, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1/2 tsp chili powder, salt to taste, 2 tbsp oil
Instructions: Boil and peel eggs. In oil, sauté chopped onions and garlic until golden. Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and salt. Cook till soft. Add eggs and simmer in the gravy for 8–10 minutes. Serve hot.

Ingredients: mutton, onion, garlic, yogurt, spices, mustard oil, ginger, salt
Quantity: 500g mutton, 2 onions, 4 garlic cloves, 1/4 cup yogurt, 2 tbsp mustard oil, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1 tsp garam masala, salt to taste
Instructions: Marinate mutton with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for 1 hour. In mustard oil, fry onions till golden. Add marinated mutton and cook on medium heat, stirring often, for 1.5–2 hours until tender and gravy thickens.

Ingredients: malabar spinach, prawn, mustard oil, spices, garlic, salt
Quantity: 2 cups chopped malabar spinach, 200g prawns, 2 tbsp mustard oil, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1/2 tsp chili powder, 2 garlic cloves, salt to taste
Instructions: Clean prawns and marinate with turmeric and salt. In mustard oil, sauté garlic, then add prawns and fry briefly. Add chopped pui shaak and spices. Cook covered for 10–12 minutes until soft and flavorful.

Ingredients: pumpkin, green chili, mustard seeds, mustard oil, salt
Quantity: 2 cups grated or finely chopped pumpkin, 2 green chilies, 1/2 tsp mustard seeds, 1 tbsp mustard oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Heat mustard oil, splutter mustard seeds. Add pumpkin and chilies, stir well. Add salt and cook covered on low heat until soft. Serve warm with rice.

Ingredients: prawn, mustard paste, coconut, mustard oil, green chili, salt
Quantity: 300g prawns, 2 tbsp mustard paste, 2 tbsp grated coconut, 2 tbsp mustard oil, 2 green chilies, salt to taste
Instructions: Mix prawns with mustard paste, coconut, mustard oil, salt, and slit green chilies. Place in a steel container or banana leaf and steam for 15–20 minutes until prawns are tender.

Quantity: 1 cup cooked rice, 1 tsp ghee, salt to taste
Instructions: Serve hot steamed rice topped with a spoon of ghee and a pinch of salt. Enjoy as a simple comfort meal.

Ingredients: gobindobhog rice, ghee, raisins, cashew, turmeric, sugar, bay leaf
Quantity: 1 cup gobindobhog rice, 2 tbsp ghee, 2 tbsp raisins, 2 tbsp cashew nuts, 1/4 tsp turmeric, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 bay leaf
Instructions: Wash rice and soak 20 mins. Heat ghee, sauté bay leaf, cashew, and raisins. Add rice, turmeric, and sugar. Fry for 2 minutes, then add water (2 cups) and cook covered on low heat until rice is done.

Ingredients: raw jackfruit, potato, bay leaf, garam masala, ginger, turmeric, oil, salt
Quantity: 2 cups raw jackfruit (cubed), 1 potato, 1 bay leaf, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 2 tbsp oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Boil jackfruit cubes until soft. In oil, fry bay leaf, add potatoes and ginger paste. Add jackfruit, turmeric, salt. Cook for 5 mins, add water. Simmer covered. Sprinkle garam masala at the end.

Ingredients: pabda fish, nigella seeds, green chili, mustard oil, turmeric, salt
Quantity: 4 pabda fish, 1/2 tsp nigella seeds, 2 green chilies, 2 tbsp mustard oil, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste
Instructions: Rub fish with salt and turmeric, lightly fry in mustard oil. In same oil, add nigella seeds and green chili. Add water to form a light gravy. Add fish and simmer 10 minutes.

Ingredients: hilsa, mustard paste, green chili, yogurt, mustard oil, salt
Quantity: 4 pieces hilsa, 2 tbsp mustard paste, 2 green chilies, 2 tbsp yogurt, 1 tbsp mustard oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Mix mustard paste, yogurt, salt, oil, and green chili. Coat hilsa pieces and place in a covered steel container or banana leaf wrap. Steam for 15–20 minutes.

Ingredients: poppy seeds, green chili, salt, mustard oil, rice flour
Quantity: 4 tbsp poppy seeds, 1 green chili, salt to taste, 1 tsp rice flour, mustard oil for frying
Instructions: Grind poppy seeds and chili into a coarse paste. Add salt and a little rice flour for binding. Shape small fritters and shallow fry in mustard oil until crispy.

Ingredients: soaked rice, hilsa fry, onion, chili, salt, mustard oil, water
Quantity: 1 cup leftover rice, 1 fried hilsa piece, 1/2 onion sliced, 1 green chili, salt to taste, 1 tsp mustard oil, water as needed
Instructions: Soak leftover rice in water overnight. Drain slightly before serving. Top with sliced onion, chili, salt, and drizzle mustard oil. Traditionally served with fried fish or mashed veggies.

Ingredients: palm fruit pulp, flour, sugar, cardamom, oil
Quantity: 1 cup palm pulp, 1/2 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 tsp cardamom powder, oil for frying
Instructions: Mix palm pulp, flour, sugar, and cardamom into a thick batter. Heat oil and drop spoonfuls to deep fry until golden brown. Serve warm.

Ingredients: chana, potato, tomato, garam masala, ginger, oil, salt
Quantity: 200g chana (paneer), 1 potato, 1 tomato, 1/2 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1 tbsp oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Cut chana into cubes. Fry lightly and set aside. Fry potatoes and tomatoes with ginger. Add water, salt, and bring to boil. Add chana and simmer 10 minutes. Sprinkle garam masala before serving.

Ingredients: ripe banana, gram flour, spices, ghee, salt, oil
Quantity: 2 ripe bananas, 2 tbsp gram flour, 1/2 tsp spice mix, 1 tsp ghee, salt to taste, oil for frying
Instructions: Mash bananas with gram flour, spices, and salt. Shape into balls and deep fry. For gravy, sauté spices in ghee, add water, and simmer koftas gently.

Quantity: 2 cups puffed rice, 1/2 cup jaggery, 1 tsp ghee, 2 tbsp water
Instructions: Melt jaggery with water until sticky. Add ghee and mix in puffed rice. Shape quickly into balls while warm. Let cool and store airtight.

Ingredients: pigeon meat, onion, garlic, garam masala
Quantity: Cook pigeon meat in spiced gravy.
Instructions: Bengali

Quantity: Fry tiny sweet drops and soak in syrup.
Instructions: Bengali

Quantity: Fry sweet rolls and soak in syrup.
Instructions: Bengali

Quantity: Make sweet rice-like dessert with chhana.
Instructions: Bengali

Ingredients: ridge gourd, potato, poppy seeds, mustard oil, green chili, salt
Quantity: 2 ridge gourds (jhinge), 2 medium potatoes, 3 tbsp poppy seed paste, 1 tbsp mustard oil, 1 green chili, salt to taste
Instructions: Peel and cut jhinge and potatoes into small pieces. Heat mustard oil and sauté the vegetables for 5 minutes. Add poppy seed paste, green chili, and salt. Cook covered for 10–12 minutes until vegetables are tender and well coated.

Ingredients: eggplant, mustard oil, garlic, green chili, salt
Quantity: 1 large eggplant, 1 tbsp mustard oil, 2 garlic cloves, 1 green chili, salt to taste
Instructions: Roast eggplant over open flame until soft and charred. Cool, peel the skin, and mash the pulp with mustard oil, chopped garlic, green chili, and salt. Serve with rice.

Ingredients: bhetki fillet, bread crumbs, egg, salt, black pepper, oil
Quantity: 4 bhetki fish fillets, 1 cup bread crumbs, 1 egg, salt to taste, 1/4 tsp black pepper, oil for frying
Instructions: Marinate fish with salt and pepper. Beat the egg. Dip fish in egg, coat with bread crumbs. Deep fry in hot oil until golden brown. Serve hot with mustard sauce or kasundi.

Ingredients: prawn, potato, bread crumbs, egg, ginger, garlic, spices, oil
Quantity: 200g prawns, 1 boiled potato, 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1 egg, 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1/2 tsp garam masala, salt to taste, oil for frying
Instructions: Boil and mash prawns with potato, spices, and ginger-garlic paste. Shape into oval cutlets. Dip in beaten egg, coat with bread crumbs, and fry until crispy and golden.

Ingredients: raw banana, besan, ginger, spices, oil
Quantity: 2 raw bananas, 2 tbsp besan, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1/2 tsp garam masala, salt to taste, oil for frying
Instructions: Boil and mash bananas. Mix with besan, ginger paste, salt, and garam masala. Shape into balls and fry. Optionally prepare a light curry and simmer koftas before serving.

Ingredients: gobindobhog rice, milk, sugar, bay leaf, cardamom
Quantity: 1/4 cup gobindobhog rice, 1 liter full cream milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 bay leaf, 1/4 tsp cardamom powder
Instructions: Wash and soak rice for 15 minutes. Boil milk with bay leaf and reduce slightly. Add rice and cook slowly until soft and creamy. Add sugar and cardamom powder. Stir and serve warm or chilled.

Ingredients: flat beans, mustard paste, green chili, mustard oil, banana leaf, salt
Quantity: 200g flat beans (sliced), 2 tbsp mustard paste, 2 green chilies (slit), 1 tbsp mustard oil, banana leaf for wrapping, salt to taste
Instructions: Mix sliced beans with mustard paste, chilies, salt, and mustard oil. Wrap the mixture in banana leaf parcels and steam or pan-cook covered for 15–20 minutes until tender and infused with flavor.

Ingredients: moong dal, bitter gourd, mustard seeds, turmeric, salt, mustard oil
Quantity: 1/2 cup moong dal, 1 small bitter gourd, 1/2 tsp mustard seeds, 1/4 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, 1 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Dry roast and boil moong dal. Slice and fry bitter gourd in mustard oil. In same oil, splutter mustard seeds, add dal, turmeric, and salt. Simmer with fried gourds for 5 minutes before serving.

Ingredients: topshe fish, besan, rice flour, spices, salt, oil
Quantity: 6 topshe fish, 2 tbsp besan, 1 tbsp rice flour, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1/2 tsp chili powder, salt to taste, oil for frying
Instructions: Clean and pat dry the fish. Mix besan, rice flour, spices, and a bit of water into a thick batter. Coat fish and deep fry until golden and crisp. Serve hot.

Quantity: 1 liter full-fat milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 tbsp plain yogurt
Instructions: Boil milk and reduce to 3/4th. Add caramelized sugar and cool until lukewarm. Stir in yogurt and pour into clay pots. Cover and let set in a warm place for 6–8 hours or overnight.

Ingredients: flour, rice flour, coconut, jaggery, milk, cardamom
Quantity: 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup rice flour, 1 cup grated coconut, 1/2 cup jaggery, 1 cup milk, 1/2 tsp cardamom powder
Instructions: Make batter with flour, rice flour, and milk. For filling, cook coconut, jaggery, and cardamom powder in a pan until mixed. Make thin crepes on a non-stick pan, fill with coconut mix, roll and serve warm or chilled.

Ingredients: gobindobhog rice, milk, sugar, bay leaf, cardamom
Quantity: 1/4 cup gobindobhog rice, 1 liter full cream milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 bay leaf, 1/4 tsp cardamom powder
Instructions: Wash and soak rice for 15 minutes. Boil milk with bay leaf and reduce slightly. Add rice and cook slowly until soft and creamy. Add sugar and cardamom powder. Stir and serve warm or chilled.

Quantity: Fry sweet rolls and soak in syrup.
Instructions: Bengali

Quantity: Make sweet rice-like dessert with chhana.
Instructions: Bengali

Ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, biscuit base
Quantity: 400g cream cheese, 1 cup sugar, 3 eggs, 1 packet biscuit base
Instructions: Mix cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs one by one. Pour onto biscuit base and bake at 160°C for 50 minutes. Cool and refrigerate for 4 hours before serving.

Quantity: 200g dark chocolate, 4 eggs, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup sugar
Instructions: Melt chocolate and let it cool. Whisk eggs with sugar, then mix with melted chocolate. Whip cream and fold into the chocolate mixture. Chill for 3 hours before serving.

Ingredients: ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, espresso, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs
Quantity: 1 pack ladyfingers, 500g mascarpone cheese, 1 cup espresso, 2 tbsp cocoa powder, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 eggs
Instructions: Dip ladyfingers in espresso and layer in a dish. Mix mascarpone with sugar and eggs, then spread over the ladyfingers. Repeat the layers and dust with cocoa powder. Refrigerate for 6 hours.

Ingredients: flour, carrots, sugar, eggs, butter, cream cheese, walnuts
Quantity: 1 cup flour, 2 cups grated carrots, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup cream cheese, 1/4 cup walnuts
Instructions: Mix all ingredients to form a batter. Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes. Cool and frost with cream cheese frosting and chopped walnuts.

Quantity: 5 apples, 1 cup sugar, 2 cups flour, 1/2 cup butter, 1 tsp cinnamon
Instructions: Slice apples and mix with sugar and cinnamon. Make dough with flour and butter, then roll out and place in a pie dish. Add apple mixture, top with dough, and bake at 200°C for 45 minutes.

Quantity: 1 cup semolina, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup ghee, 10 cashews, 1/2 tsp cardamom
Instructions: Roast semolina in ghee until golden. Add sugar and water, stir to form a smooth mixture. Garnish with cashews and cardamom, then serve warm.

Ingredients: milk powder, flour, baking soda, sugar, ghee, cardamom
Quantity: 1 cup milk powder, 1/4 cup flour, 1/4 tsp baking soda, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 cup ghee, 2 cardamom pods
Instructions: Make dough with milk powder, flour, baking soda, and ghee. Shape into small balls and deep fry. Soak in sugar syrup with cardamom for 30 minutes before serving.

Quantity: 1/4 cup rice, 2 cups milk, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 tsp cardamom, 10 almonds
Instructions: Boil rice in milk, then add sugar and cardamom. Simmer until thickened, garnish with almonds, and serve hot or chilled.

Quantity: 200g chana, 1 liter milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 cardamom pods, saffron strands
Instructions: Boil milk and reduce by half. Add sugar, cardamom, and saffron. Soak chana in the syrup for 15 minutes and serve chilled.

Quantity: 1 cup vermicelli, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 tbsp ghee, 1/2 tsp cardamom, 2 cups milk
Instructions: Fry vermicelli in ghee until golden. Add milk and sugar, and cook until soft. Add cardamom and serve warm.

Quantity: 2 cups milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 tsp cardamom, 1/4 cup pistachio, saffron strands
Instructions: Boil milk until reduced by half. Add sugar, cardamom, pistachio, and saffron. Pour into molds and freeze for 6 hours.

Ingredients: egg whites, sugar, cornstarch, vinegar, fruits
Quantity: 4 egg whites, 1 cup sugar, 1 tbsp cornstarch, 1 tsp vinegar, mixed fruits for topping
Instructions: Whisk egg whites with sugar until stiff. Fold in cornstarch and vinegar. Bake at 120°C for 1 hour. Top with whipped cream and fresh fruits.

Ingredients: bananas, toffee, whipped cream, biscuit base
Quantity: 2 bananas, 1/2 cup toffee, 1 cup whipped cream, 1 packet biscuit base
Instructions: Make base with crushed biscuits and butter. Layer with toffee, sliced bananas, and whipped cream. Chill for 2 hours before serving.

Ingredients: flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, butter, milk
Quantity: 2 cups flour, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup milk
Instructions: Mix all ingredients to make a batter. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes. Frost with chocolate icing and serve.

Ingredients: chocolate, butter, flour, sugar, eggs, vanilla
Quantity: 200g dark chocolate, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 1 tsp vanilla
Instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together. Mix with eggs, sugar, and flour. Pour into ramekins, add a piece of chocolate in the center, and bake at 200°C for 10–12 minutes. Serve warm.

Quantity: 2 cups heavy cream, 1/2 cup sugar, 4 egg yolks, 1 tsp vanilla
Instructions: Heat cream with sugar until warm. Whisk egg yolks, then combine with warm cream. Pour into ramekins and bake at 160°C for 40 minutes. Cool and sprinkle sugar on top. Caramelize the sugar with a torch.

Quantity: 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup cream, 1 cup strawberries
Instructions: Make dough with flour, sugar, and butter. Bake at 180°C for 15 minutes. Whip cream and slice strawberries. Layer shortcakes with cream and strawberries.

Ingredients: lemon, sugar, eggs, butter, pie crust
Quantity: 1 lemon, 1/2 cup sugar, 3 eggs, 1/4 cup butter, 1 pie crust
Instructions: Make lemon curd with lemon juice, sugar, eggs, and butter. Pour into pie crust and bake at 160°C for 25 minutes. Top with meringue and bake for an additional 10 minutes.

Quantity: 2 eggs, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 small onion (chopped)
Instructions: Whisk eggs with salt. Pour into a hot, greased pan. Add chopped onions and cook until set. Flip and cook the other side for 1-2 minutes.

Quantity: 2 medium potatoes, 2 green chilies, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Boil potatoes and mash them. Heat oil in a pan, fry chopped chilies, and add mashed potatoes. Mix well and serve.

Quantity: 500g chicken, 1 onion (chopped), 2 green chilies, 2 tbsp oil
Instructions: Fry chopped onion and chilies in oil until golden. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add water and simmer until chicken is cooked through.

Quantity: 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp butter, 1 cooked chicken breast (shredded)
Instructions: Spread butter on bread slices. Place shredded chicken between the slices and toast until golden.

Quantity: 2 eggs, water for boiling, 1/4 tsp salt
Instructions: Place eggs in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes. Peel and sprinkle with salt before serving.

Quantity: 3 medium potatoes, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 tbsp oil
Instructions: Cut potatoes into thin slices. Heat oil in a pan and fry potatoes until crispy. Sprinkle with salt and serve.

Quantity: 1 carrot, 1 onion, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 cups water
Instructions: Chop carrot and onion, boil them in water with salt. Simmer for 15 minutes until vegetables are soft. Blend if desired.

Quantity: 1 packet noodles, 4 garlic cloves, 2 green chilies, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Cook noodles as per packet instructions. In a pan, heat oil, sauté garlic and chilies, then toss in cooked noodles. Stir well and serve.

Quantity: 1/4 cup rice, 2 cups milk, 1/4 cup sugar
Instructions: Cook rice in milk and sugar until it thickens. Stir occasionally. Let it cool before serving.

Quantity: 2 papads, 2 green chilies, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Roast papads in the microwave or over an open flame. Top with chopped chilies and drizzle with oil.

Quantity: 1 cup cooked rice, 1/2 cup mixed vegetables, 1 tbsp soy sauce
Instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add vegetables and stir-fry. Add cooked rice and soy sauce. Stir until combined and serve.

Quantity: 2 slices bread, 1 egg, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp butter
Instructions: Whisk egg and sugar together. Dip bread slices into the egg mixture and cook in butter until golden on both sides.

Quantity: 3 medium potatoes, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Boil and chop potatoes. Toss with salt and a little oil. Chill for a refreshing salad.

Quantity: 1 cup flour, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 cup water
Instructions: Knead flour, salt, and water into a dough. Roll into thin discs and cook on a hot tawa until golden brown.

Quantity: 2 tomatoes, 3 garlic cloves, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 cups water
Instructions: Blend tomatoes and garlic into a puree. Boil in water with salt for 10-15 minutes. Serve hot.

Quantity: 2 slices bread, 2 slices cheese, 1 tbsp butter
Instructions: Butter the bread slices. Place cheese between them and toast until golden.

Quantity: 1 apple, 1 banana, 1/2 cup grapes, 1 tbsp sugar
Instructions: Chop fruits and mix in a bowl. Add sugar and stir. Serve chilled.

Quantity: 1 cup flour, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Make dough with flour, salt, and water. Roll into discs, fill with a little spice mix, fold and deep fry until golden.

Quantity: 1/2 cup vermicelli, 1 cup milk, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 tsp cardamom
Instructions: Roast vermicelli in a little oil. Add milk, sugar, and cardamom. Simmer until thickened and serve warm.

Quantity: 1 corn cob, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tbsp butter
Instructions: Boil corn for 10-12 minutes, then brush with butter and sprinkle with salt.

Quantity: 1 cucumber, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1/2 tsp sugar
Instructions: Slice cucumber and toss with salt, lemon juice, and sugar. Chill before serving.

Ingredients: pasta, cucumber, tomato, olive oil, salt
Quantity: 1 cup pasta, 1/2 cucumber, 1 tomato, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/4 tsp salt
Instructions: Cook pasta and let it cool. Chop cucumber and tomato. Toss everything with olive oil and salt.

Quantity: 2 eggs, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 tbsp butter
Instructions: Whisk eggs with salt. Heat butter in a pan, pour in eggs, and stir continuously until cooked.

Quantity: 1 cup chickpeas, 1 onion, 1 tomato, 2 green chilies, 1 tbsp lemon juice
Instructions: Boil chickpeas and mix with chopped onion, tomato, chilies, and lemon juice. Serve chilled.

Quantity: 3 medium potatoes, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Boil potatoes, peel and slice. Heat oil in a pan, fry potato slices and sprinkle salt. Serve hot.

Quantity: 2 slices bread, 2 garlic cloves, 1 tbsp butter, 1/2 tsp parsley
Instructions: Toast the bread. Melt butter, mix in garlic and parsley, and spread on the bread. Serve warm.

Ingredients: flattened rice, onion, mustard seeds, peas, oil, turmeric
Quantity: 1 cup poha, 1 onion, 1/2 tsp mustard seeds, 1/4 cup peas, 1 tbsp oil, 1/2 tsp turmeric
Instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and turmeric, then sauté onions and peas. Add poha, stir, and serve warm.

Ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, cocoa powder, milk, butter
Quantity: 1/4 cup flour, 2 tbsp sugar, 1/4 tsp baking powder, 1 tbsp cocoa powder, 2 tbsp milk, 1 tbsp butter
Instructions: Mix ingredients in a mug and microwave for 1 minute. Enjoy your single-serve cake.

Quantity: 1 cup flour, 1/4 tsp salt, water as needed
Instructions: Knead flour, salt, and water into soft dough. Roll out dough into thin circles and cook on a hot tawa for 1 minute on each side.

Quantity: 2 eggs, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp chili powder, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Boil eggs for 10 minutes. Peel and cut in half. Heat oil, sprinkle chili powder and salt, and sauté the boiled eggs for 2 minutes.

Quantity: 1/2 cup oats, 1 cup milk, 1 tbsp sugar, 1/4 tsp cinnamon
Instructions: Mix all ingredients in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 2 minutes. Stir and serve warm.

Ingredients: rice, mixed vegetables, oil, salt, garam masala
Quantity: 1 cup rice, 1/2 cup mixed vegetables, 1 tbsp oil, 1/2 tsp garam masala, salt to taste
Instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add vegetables and sauté. Add rice, garam masala, salt, and water. Cook for 10-12 minutes until rice is done.

Quantity: 1 cup rice flour, 1/2 cup water, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Mix rice flour, water, and salt into a smooth batter. Heat a non-stick pan, spread the batter, and cook for 2 minutes on each side.

Ingredients: bread, potato, chickpea flour, salt, chili, oil
Quantity: 2 slices bread, 1 potato, 1/4 cup chickpea flour, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp chili powder, oil for frying
Instructions: Boil and mash potato, mix with salt and chili. Place filling between bread slices, dip in chickpea flour batter, and fry in oil for 2 minutes.

Ingredients: paneer, yogurt, chili powder, turmeric, garam masala
Quantity: 200g paneer, 2 tbsp yogurt, 1/2 tsp chili powder, 1/4 tsp turmeric, 1/2 tsp garam masala
Instructions: Mix yogurt and spices, coat paneer with the mixture, and microwave for 2-3 minutes until slightly golden.

Quantity: 1 cucumber, 1 tomato, 1 onion, 1/2 lemon, salt to taste
Instructions: Chop vegetables, toss together, squeeze lemon juice, sprinkle salt, and serve immediately.

Ingredients: egg, onion, tomato, chili, salt, oil
Quantity: 2 eggs, 1 onion, 1 tomato, 1 chili, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions, tomatoes, and chilies. Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Serve hot.

Quantity: 1 ripe mango, 1 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp sugar
Instructions: Blend mango pulp with yogurt and sugar until smooth. Serve chilled.

Ingredients: pasta, cream, cheese, garlic, salt, pepper
Quantity: 1 cup pasta, 1/4 cup cream, 1/2 cup cheese, 2 garlic cloves, salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: Cook pasta as per instructions. In a pan, heat cream and sauté garlic. Add pasta, cheese, salt, and pepper. Toss and serve.

Quantity: 2 slices bread, 2 slices cheese, 1 tbsp butter
Instructions: Butter the bread, place cheese slices between, and grill on both sides until golden brown.

Quantity: 2 medium potatoes, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper
Instructions: Cut potatoes into wedges, toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes until crispy.

Quantity: 2 slices bread, 1/2 cup cheese, 2 tbsp tomato sauce, oregano
Instructions: Spread tomato sauce on bread, top with cheese and herbs, and microwave for 1-2 minutes until cheese melts.

Quantity: 1 cup boiled chickpeas, 1 onion, 1 tomato, 2 green chilies, 1 tbsp lemon juice
Instructions: Chop onion, tomato, and chilies. Mix with boiled chickpeas and lemon juice. Serve chilled.

Quantity: 1 carrot, 1/2 cup cabbage, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Heat oil, sauté vegetables, add soy sauce, stir-fry for 5 minutes, and serve hot.

Quantity: 1 cup rice, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1/2 cup mixed vegetables, 1 egg
Instructions: Heat oil, stir-fry vegetables, add cooked rice, soy sauce, and a scrambled egg. Mix well and serve.

Quantity: 2 boiled eggs, 2 tbsp mayo, 1 tsp mustard, salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: Chop boiled eggs, mix with mayo, mustard, salt, and pepper. Serve cold.

Quantity: 2 slices bread, 1 egg, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp butter
Instructions: Whisk egg and sugar together. Dip bread slices into the egg mixture and cook in butter until golden on both sides.

Quantity: 3 tomatoes, 3 garlic cloves, 2 cups water, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tbsp oil
Instructions: Boil tomatoes and garlic in water. Blend into a smooth soup and season with salt. Heat oil and pour the soup. Serve hot.

Quantity: 1/2 cup flour, 1/4 cup milk, 2 tbsp sugar, 1/2 tsp baking powder
Instructions: Mix all ingredients into a batter, pour into a microwave-safe bowl, and microwave for 2-3 minutes. Serve with syrup.

Ingredients: potato, poppy seeds, mustard oil, salt
Quantity: 3 medium potatoes, 2 tbsp poppy seeds, 2 tbsp mustard oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Boil and mash potatoes. Grind poppy seeds into a paste. Heat mustard oil, add poppy seed paste and mashed potatoes. Cook for 5 minutes and serve.

Quantity: 2 medium potatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Slice potatoes into thin rounds. Heat mustard oil, add turmeric and fry the potato slices until golden brown. Sprinkle with salt and serve.

Ingredients: leftover rice, green chili, mustard oil, salt
Quantity: 1 cup leftover rice, 2 green chilies, 1 tbsp mustard oil, salt to taste
Instructions: Soak leftover rice in water overnight. Serve with chopped green chili, mustard oil, and a pinch of salt.

Ingredients: fish, mustard oil, salt, green chili
Quantity: 2 pieces small fish, 2 tbsp mustard oil, salt to taste, 1 green chili
Instructions: Grill or fry fish, mash with green chili, salt, and mustard oil. Serve with rice.

Ingredients: chana dal, tomato, turmeric, garam masala, oil
Quantity: 1 cup chana dal, 1 tomato, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1/2 tsp garam masala, 2 tbsp oil
Instructions: Soak and grind chana dal into a paste. Fry into small cakes and cook in spiced tomato gravy. Serve hot.

Ingredients: fish, mustard paste, turmeric, salt, mustard oil
Quantity: 4 pieces of fish, 2 tbsp mustard paste, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt. Fry lightly in mustard oil, then cook with mustard paste until the gravy thickens. Serve with rice.

Ingredients: lentil, salt, mustard oil, green chili
Quantity: 1 cup lentil, salt to taste, 2 tbsp mustard oil, 2 green chilies
Instructions: Boil lentils and mash them with green chilies, salt, and mustard oil. Serve as a side dish with rice.

Ingredients: potato, onion, turmeric, garam masala, mustard oil
Quantity: 3 medium potatoes, 1 onion, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1/2 tsp garam masala, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Peel and boil potatoes. Fry onions in mustard oil, add turmeric and garam masala. Cook the potatoes in the mixture for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

Ingredients: prawn, coconut milk, turmeric, salt, mustard oil
Quantity: 200g prawns, 1 cup coconut milk, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Fry prawns lightly in mustard oil, add coconut milk, turmeric, and salt. Cook for 5 minutes and serve with rice.

Ingredients: flour, rice flour, coconut, jaggery, cardamom
Quantity: 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup rice flour, 1 cup grated coconut, 1/2 cup jaggery, 1/4 tsp cardamom
Instructions: Make a batter of flour and rice flour. Cook coconut and jaggery into a thick filling. Stuff the crepes with the filling and serve.

Ingredients: moong dal, green chili, salt, mustard oil
Quantity: 1 cup moong dal, 2 green chilies, salt to taste, 2 tbsp mustard oil
Instructions: Soak moong dal, then fry it in mustard oil until golden brown. Add green chilies and salt and serve hot.

Ingredients: prawn, mustard oil, salt, green chili
Quantity: 200g prawns, 2 tbsp mustard oil, salt to taste, 2 green chilies
Instructions: Boil and mash prawns with green chilies, salt, and mustard oil. Serve as a side dish with rice.

Ingredients: eggplant, gram flour, turmeric, salt, oil
Quantity: 1 large eggplant, 1/2 cup gram flour, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, oil for frying
Instructions: Slice eggplant into thin rounds. Make a batter with gram flour, turmeric, and salt. Dip eggplant slices in the batter and deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot.

Ingredients: chana dal, coconut, cumin, turmeric, salt
Quantity: 1 cup chana dal, 1/4 cup grated coconut, 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt to taste
Instructions: Soak and boil chana dal. In a pan, heat oil, add cumin seeds, grated coconut, turmeric, and salt. Mix in the boiled dal and cook for 5 minutes. Serve with rice.
